page.title: 06 Energy.
page.content: Along side almost every{road}and{lane in the country are regularly spaced poles which carry overhead cables. Some of these are used for{electricity which is one of the main sources of power. It is used for{lighting}of all properties both private and public and for the illumination of the roads. Most of these lights have a switch sensitive to daylight which turns the light on as the dusk gathers and off again in the morning. Some of these lights stay on at all times of darkness. Provision of such lighting has enabled much more evening activity to take place than when there was only {gas-}or indeed no lighting.
